title: BMW - motor vehicles produced worldwide 2006 to 2016
summary: Overall Production in thousand units has increased over the Year.
Production in thousand units is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2013, and finally roughly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Production in thousand units, of value 2165.57 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Production in thousand units, of value 1258.42 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Production in thousand units has rose over the Year.
